ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities on osu-wiki include updates to the MWC 7K 2025 team listing and rules, as well as the addition of a news post for the 3 Digit World Cup 2025, including registration links, banner images, and forum thread links. These activities demonstrate the ongoing effort to maintain and update the osu-wiki with relevant information for the community.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen recent activity with a pull request aimed at fixing angle bonuses, specifically addressing issues with repetition calculations and distance scaling for wide bonuses, which is a critical aspect of the game's mechanics and overall player experience.
